thread.title: Emmerdale spoiler: Emma fears psychic Faith will reveal the truth about James' death
thread.title_full: Emmerdale spoiler: Emma fears psychic Faith will reveal the truth about James' death

author: Kyle O'Sullivan
title: Emmerdale spoiler: Emma fears psychic Faith will reveal the truth about James' death
text:
Faith claims to hear the voice of James from beyond the grave (Photo: ITV) Share Get soaps   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
In tonight's Emmerdale, Emma's big secret may be exposed when Faith holds a group psychic reading. 
She previously mocked Faith for claiming she could talk to the spirit world, but Emma panics as preparations for the spooky communication begin. 
With everyone in the pub gathered around Faith in her dark shades, an emotional Emma watches on in horror. 
James could be about to get his revenge from beyond the grave by revealing he was pushed off the bridge by his wife. Read More Emmerdale's Gemma Atkinson hints at Carly Hope's exit and admits filming choking scenes was 'terrifying' Faith's prophesying panics Emma 
Elsewhere, Carly decides to take action after failing to help a chocking April, and plans to secretly leave the village to get over her guilt. 
Actress Gemma Atkinson admitted on Lorraine that filming the scenes were "terrifying" and horrible to watch, while also hinting at an exit for Carly who "runs" from her problems. 
Meanwhile, Bob grows increasingly concerned for Sandy. 
* Emmerdale airs on ITV tonight at 7.00pm Like us on Facebook
